Class RGBColor

java.lang.Object
  RGBColor

public class RGBColor
extends java.lang.Object

Write a description of class RGBColor here. the class present a pixel which includes three type of colors: red, green, and blue. with the class methods you can performe sets activities, gets, mixing with other color, invert the color, convert to a gray scale, and check if its equals to other color. color describes with three integers, and legale only if its between 0 and 255.

Version:
(MMN 12 Q1 - 09/11/2014)
Author:
(Oz Maatuk)
